text: Other viral proteins also found in viroplasms include RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp) VP1, the main inner-core protein VP2, guanyltransferase/methylase VP3, and the middle layer (inner capsid) protein VP6 (10, 11) . Biochemical evidence suggests that viroplasms are essential for RV replication, since virus production is highly impaired upon silencing of either NSP2 or NSP5 (12) (13) (14) (15) .
